mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recharge_order WHERE od_user_id = #{odUserId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recharge_order (id, od_user_id, amount, product_id, product_name, payment_method, trade_no, status, gold_amount, diamond_amount, bonus_items, create_time, pay_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{odUserId}, #{amount}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{paymentMethod}, #{tradeNo}, #{status}, #{goldAmount}, #{diamondAmount}, #{bonusItems}, #{createTime}, #{payTime}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status = #{status}, trade_no = #{tradeNo}, pay_time = #{payTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}
